pkgmetadata.longdescription: The FisherEM Algorithm to Simultaneously Cluster and Visualize High-Dimensional Data // The FisherEM algorithm, proposed by Bouveyron Brunet (201) doi:10.1007/s11222-011-9249-9, is an efficient method for the clustering of high-dimensional data. FisherEM models and clusters the data in a discriminative and low-dimensional latent subspace. It also provides a low- dimensional representation of the clustered data. A sparse version of Fisher-EM algorithm is also provided.
